service.name: can
service.step: https://05b4251bc59a5facfc0f2841b7f9284c2d68b649.googledrive.com/host/0B-659FdpCliwQU42Uk5yWUVFMnM/$book-$chapter.xml
select * from xml where url="$url" and itemPath="//verse[@number='$passage']/text()"

service.name: biblija_net
service.step: http://www.biblija.net/biblija.cgi?m=$book+$chapter:$passage&$edition=1&pos=0&l=nl&set=10
http://open.dapper.net/RunDapp?dappName=biblepassagebiblijanet&v=1&applyToUrl=$url
select passage.content from xml where url="$url"

service.name: biblija2_net
service.step: http://www.biblija.net/biblija.cgi?Bible=Bible&m=$book+$chapter%3A+$passage&$edition=1&pos=0&set=1&l=en
use "http://www.datatables.org/data/data.html.cssselect.xml" as data.html.cssselect;select td.p,div.p from data.html.cssselect where url="$url" and css=".text,.pi,.p,.m,.q";

service.name: biblija3_net
service.step: http://www.biblija.net/biblija.cgi?Bible=Bible&m=$book+$chapter%3A+$passage&$edition=1&pos=0&set=1&l=en

select * from html where url="$url" and xpath="//td[contains(@class,'text')]//text()[not(contains(ancestor::div[1]/@class,'mt') or contains(parent::span/@class,'v') or contains(parent::span/@class,'c') or contains(ancestor::div[1]/@class,'s'))]";

service.name: usccb_org
service.step: http://origin.usccb.org/bible/$book/$chapter
select * from html where url="$url" and xpath="//div[@id='scribeI']/*/text()[preceding::span[@class='bcv'][1]='$passage'][not(ancestor::p[@class='fn' or @class='en'])]"

service.name: crosswire_org
service.step: http://www.crosswire.org/study/passagestudy.jsp?key=$book+$chapter:$passage&mod=$edition
http://open.dapper.net/RunDapp?dappName=bijbelpassagecrosswireorg&v=1&applyToUrl=$url
select passage.content from xml where url="$url"

service.name: diebibel_de
service.step: select * from html where url="http://www.die-bibel.de/bibelstelle/$book$chapter,$passage/$edition/" and xpath="//div[@class='markdown']/p/text()"

service.name: unbound_biola_edu
service.step: use "http://www.datatables.org/data/htmlpost.xml" as htmlpost; select * from htmlpost where xpath="//tr[count(preceding-sibling::tr) = 3]/td/p/text()" and url="http://unbound.biola.edu/index.cfm?method=searchResults.doSearch" and postdata="search_type=simple_search&parallel_1=$edition&parallel_2=&parallel_3=&parallel_4=&book_section=00&book=$book&from_chap=$chapter&from_verse=$passage&to_chap=&to_verse=&text_word=&and_or=AND&and_word=&not_word=&submit=Search&displayFormat=verseAboveNoHeader&highlightFormat=none&num_main=default&num_left=default&num_right=default&show_commentary=0&show_context=0&show_illustrations=0&show_maps=0&versification=nrsva"

service.name: bibliacatolica_com
service.step: select * from html where url="http://www.bibliacatolica.com.br/$edition/$book/$chapter.php" and xpath="//div[@class = 'row']/p[$passage]"

service.name: laparola_net
service.step: http://www.laparola.net/testo.php?riferimento=$book+$chapter%3A$passage&versioni[]=$edition&Submit=Visualizza+testo
http://open.dapper.net/RunDapp?dappName=biblepassagelaparolanet&v=1&applyToUrl=$url
select passage.content from xml where url="$url"
